ing: 1/4 cup spicy tomato-vegetable juice cocktail (such as V8Â®)
des: "A nice, sugar-free cocktail sauce that works perfectly on shrimp cocktails."
ins: Mix tomato paste, vegetable juice, horseradish, lemon juice, hot sauce, and salt together in a bowl. Cover and refrigerate until chilled, about 1 hour. Serve with lemon wedges for garnish.
